originalText.text: Well, Mark and I must’ve had completely different experiences because this IS the Longaberger I remember. The artistry and craftsmanship is as good as ever; superlative!  The customer service was prompt and professional.  We received our new longabergers, an exquisite addition to our collection I might add, within 5 business days.  The whole experience has been an absolute basket of joy.  Thanks Longaberger Company!

text.text: Well, Mark and I must’ve had completely different experiences because this IS the Longaberger I remember. The artistry and craftsmanship is as good as ever; superlative! originalText.text: This is NOT the Longaberger you remember. First and only order made with them, TWO 2023 Easter baskets. I received ONE Easter basket in a box with a packing slip for a completely different person and that slip was not even for what was in the box. There is NO phone number to call to speak to anyone so you are forced to their email support that takes two days between replies. So now more than 2 weeks since the original order and being told they would ship out my missing item, I am still waiting for them to ship it. It has been over a week since the replacement order was submitted and it has not been shipped. I emailed again and received a reply from the them today stating it would ship in "5 to 7 business days." I really wanted this to be a good experience and a place to get Longaberger Baskets again, but it looks like that is not going to be the case.
